posts.post_content:
Had an exciting walk-in today.  One of the items was an L1 Leather Cobb!  
I am trying to find L1's on VCP.  Can anyone help with what they are listed as on there?  In doing a google search, it does not appear that any have sold recently.  Anyone know if they are on VCP?  Or recent sales?
The last sale in cardtarget was from ten years ago. A somewhat nicer example than yours sold for $2,700. I would assume it would go for multiples of that today.
Thanks for the input.  2011 was the one that I found but assumed that there had to be others.

Hunt Auctions has sold a couple over the years.

David
